entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then south 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low plus 2 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
